name: Send a Slack message for every new record found in Airtable
description: Streamline your team communication by automatically sending messages to Slack whenever specific records are found in Airtable. This template allows you to efficiently monitor your Airtable database and keep your team updated in real-time, enhancing collaboration and ensuring everyone is on the same page. Simply set up your Airtable with the necessary records, and let Make handle the rest!
